headline: Dealer Alchemist Unveils Soft Credit Pull for Instant Website Prequalification
summary: New solution powered by Equifax VantageScore delivers up to 20% more qualified leads without hard credit pulls or workflow changesLONE TREE, Colo., Oct. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dealer Alchemist, an industry leader in automotive digital marketing solutions, today announced the release of Soft Credit Pull, a website-integrated prequalification tool that gives shoppers instant, credit-informed payment estimates without a hard credit pull. Powered by Equifax® VantageScore®, the solution enables

headline: Credit Card Fraud Escalates As Fraud Continues to Be a Concern for Canadians
summary: - Identity fraud fuels sharp rise in credit card cases -- Equifax Canada Market Pulse Fraud Trends and Insights Report - TORONTO, Oct. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Equifax Canada’s Market Pulse Fraud Trends and Insights Report for the first half of 2025 reveals a sharp rise in credit card fraud, even as overall application fraud rates across Canada have fallen to their lowest point since Q3 2022.
